metadata.title: CVE-2015-5540 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.232 onWindows and OS X and before 11.2.202.508 on Linux, Adobe AIR before18.0.0.199, Adobe AIR SDK before 18.0.0.199, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compilerbefore 18.0.0.199 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code viaunspecified vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-5127,CVE-2015-5130, CVE-2015-5134, CVE-2015-5539, CVE-2015-5550, CVE-2015-5551,CVE-2015-5556, CVE-2015-5557, CVE-2015-5559, CVE-2015-5561, CVE-2015-5563,CVE-2015-5564, and CVE-2015-5565.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5540` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1').
